definition: coleoptile, protective sheath covering an emerging shoot (botany)
germ layer/layer of tissue in embryology

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a wheat germ nutrient flour and its preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种麦胚营养粉及其制备方法。

sentences.english: The caryopsis is unusual, as the embryo extends along its whole length.
sentences.chinese: 当胚沿着它的整个长度延长时，颖果是不平常的。

sentences.english: Extraction of oil from the wheat germ leaves behind the defatted wheat germ.
sentences.chinese: 脱脂肪麦胚是小麦胚提油后的产品。

sentences.english: The process of embryonic germination was similar to zygotic embryoid but presented some abnormal embryoids.
sentences.chinese: 胚状体萌发过程与合子胚相似，但出现了一些畸形胚。

sentences.english: The process of embryonic germination was similar to zygotic embryoid but presented some abnormal embryoids.
sentences.chinese: 胚状体萌发过程与合子胚相似，但出现了一些畸形胚。

sentences.english: The first division of the zygote is transverse. The embryogeny belongs to the Onagrd type.
sentences.chinese: 合子第一次分裂为横分裂，胚的发育属柳叶菜型。

sentences.english: Seeds with abundant endosperm and small embryo.
sentences.chinese: 种子有丰富的胚乳和小的胚。

sentences.english: The water potential of embryo was positively correlated with its moisture content.
sentences.chinese: 番茄种胚水势与含水量的关系呈幂指数的正相关。

sentences.english: Days after fecundation is another factor effect on callus induction.
sentences.chinese: 幼胚的发育状态是影响诱导愈伤组织的另一因素。

sentences.english: The polarity distributions of starch grains and aleurone were extremely evident in the early stage of globular embryo.
sentences.chinese: 球胚形成前期，淀粉粒和糊粉粒极性分布已很明显。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the method of treating hypophysial dwarf by transplantation of embryonic anterior pituitary cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索人胚腺垂体移植治疗垂体性侏儒症的新途径。

sentences.english: There is also a certain interrelation of development be- tween the fruit, the embryo and the endosperm.
sentences.chinese: 胚和胚乳的发育与果实的生长有一定的相关性。

sentences.english: In vitro development of early proembryos and plant regeneration via microculture in Oryza sativa L.
sentences.chinese: 应用微室饲养系统培养水稻早期原胚。

sentences.english: The relation between property of hammer crusher and property of separation and breaking was studied.
sentences.chinese: 锤片式粉碎机的设计参数对脱胚破碎指标的影响很大。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze treatment and prognosis of sacrococcygeal endodermal sinus tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨骶尾部内胚窦瘤的治疗和预后。

definition: blank (e.g. for a coin)/unburnt earthenware/semifinished product/Taiwan pr. [pei1]
base/semifinished product/(fig.) the makings of (a talented actor etc)
milling/to grind/to polish by grinding/to abrade/whetstone/pestle
blank (for a coin etc)/breed or strain
